about_the_game:
Haru and Wonder Land is a game where Haru, a young cellist, embarks on an adventure in a mysterious world.

Emotional Connection and Profound Experience through Music

  • Music is a powerful medium to evoke emotions.

  • The story and characters' feelings are expressed through playing music and lyrics.

  • Players collect musical notes to complete scores within the game.

  • Once a score is completed, it can be used like a skill in an RPG game.

  • Playing music allows players to solve puzzles or simply enjoy the melodies.

Creative Puzzles and Problem Solving

  • Puzzles are solved through musical performances.

  • Each performance and note interacts with specific objects in the world.

  • Players create paths, open doors, and find items through music.

Harmonizing Exploration and Storytelling

  • The protagonist embarks on a journey to complete musical scores, lift a curse, and find a way home.

  • Through collecting notes and performing, the story and protagonist's emotions unfold.

  • Players gain a deeper understanding of the world and its characters through this immersive experience.
